subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] how to use Unicode
msgSnippet: ... Since the encoding is quite new, I think there aren t keybaord drivers for any system yet. What s your operating system? Windows? Unix (including Linux)?
messageBody:
Paul Tremblay wrote:
>>> With an appropriate keyboard driver.
>
> Which means?

Since the encoding is quite new, I think there aren't keybaord drivers for
any system yet. What's your operating system? Windows? Unix (including
Linux)? Mac OS? Which version?
